game.description: The village of Oakwood is plagued by a group of bandits who have taken over the nearby forest. The villagers are too afraid to enter the forest and collect firewood, which is essential for their survival.
game.objective: Retrieve 10 bundles of firewood from the Oakwood Forest.
game.quest_giver: Thorne Blackwood, Village Elder of Oakwood

tasks.description: Gather firewood from the trees in the forest.

game.title: The Firewood Quest
